Oh! That bird caught a lizard!

That’s

an Indian kingfisher!

That bird may not be as beautiful as the Indian
kingfishers in
England, but it
seems quite
swift.

Wow, you really do know a lot!

Hey, why is the sky so hazy?

Oh!

It’s fine dust. Looks like it has blown over from Africa.

Huh?

You mean

dust can blow all

this way from

the mainland?

Sure can, easily.

This must

be the same

phenomenon that

explains how seeds

of flowerless plants

are spread across

wide areas.

?
